website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, easy-to-use handheld steam cleaner that is best suited for lighter duty applications.
pros: The Everyday Handheld Steam Cleaner can heat up in about 3 minutes and it has a long cord so you can reach places up to 12 feet away
It comes with 6 different accessories that allow you to clean in a variety of situations
cons: This handheld steam cleaner holds 6 ounces of water, which only gives the unit about 8 minutes of cleaning time per fill

customer_reviews.title: I bought this steamer about 4 years ago, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer about 4 years ago, and have used it occasionally (not often). Today I plugged it in, and after several minutes pressed the trigger to check if the steam was ready. I heard a snap, and the trigger felt sloppy and did nothing. I managed to disassemble the unit (out of warranty) enough to look inside, and discovered that one of the hinge pins for the trigger lever had broken off. Cheap plastic part, obviously not designed for "everyday" use, let alone the light use I've subjected it to. No obvious way to repair the trigger, and no replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Wildajo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the size/money!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome little machine. Lots of whiners on here, but the fact is that for the size and price, it's fantastic. I used this on some grout/tile that needed some serious cleaning and while it took some time and effort, it really did a terrific job. It has several different attachments for your various needs. I highly recommend this machine. Takes less than 3 minutes after refilling to be ready to go and it lasts 5-8 minutes before it needs to be refilled. Anyone complaining that it doesn't last long enough needs to get an education. You can't expect 30 minutes of continuous steam from a device with roughly two cups of water in it. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: OzMoses

customer_reviews.title: Neat Steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best hand held steamers I have used so far. After using the one from dirtdevil, this is a huge improvement!. Its easy to hold and operate and seems quite powerful. The water heats up quickly and I love the little cup that comes with it for filling water. I hope and pray that this steamer lasts longer than the Dirt devil (it stopped working in less than 6 months) steamer. It would have been nice if it was a little less noisy but other than that I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Truthserum

customer_reviews.title: Little cleaner, big results (for little jobs!)
customer_reviews.text: This little guy works fairly well for it's small form. I purchased this to use at work as a field service engineer working on medical equipment. While cleaning the equipment, without the steamer, you spend about 15/20 minutes wiping/scraping stuff off. WITH the cleaner, it drops to about 5 minutes of cleaning time *(plus time to heat up), and the gunk just melts off. The small form factor allowed me to store this little guy in a pelican case. This made the steamer a very mobile solution. For larger jobs, I'd recommend a larger unit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Useful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool--powerful and invaluable--in getting things like yucky shower stall tile grout blasted out of sight. also, we used it on kitchen linoleum--worked like a charm. another great feature is that it is lightweight even when filled to full capacity with water. I can't recommend this 'steamer' enough to anyone who wants and needs full-tilt hygenic cleaning of whatever is needed. it is also relatively easy to assemble. i love it and am so happy that i purchased it and truth be told, I don't understand the 'negative' reviews here at all--
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: The product works goods but I am disappointed that stoped to work for any reason. I recommended this product for some friends that bough and one of those have the same problem with the button that stopped to work . I tried contact with the seller number and were rude and basically told me that not have parts to replace and makes me feel with the sensation that I did a super bad choice in trust a brand that for me is new and doesn't care if you have a problem. Think twice in get this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sania Revault Diaz

customer_reviews.title: waste of time
customer_reviews.text: only buy this if you want to blow warm moist air on your hard to clean surfaces. it wasn’t even warm enough to give yourself a facial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cleaner. I found the pressure adequate and the heat high. I was a little wary at first - I took this guy against some serious mold on my bathroom ceiling above the shower and wasn't noticing much effect at first. However, over the weeks following several steaming attempts, I saw the population start to reduce. I think I killed a lot but it left some mold stains (hence 4 stars instead of 5). I may need to actually take a chemical cleaner to finish the job and lift the stains but I was glad to reduce the population first.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: amazing on grout!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen floor grout was looking horrible. I contacted a company to come and steam it for over $250. I purchased this little steamer thinking I was probably wasting money, but thought it was worth a try! Oh, my! I absolutely can not believe how powerful and how well it cleaned my grout, took fingerprints right off the kitchen chairs! Made the outside of my toilet sparkle! The small brushes are great for grout. No attachment necessary for cleaning the outside of the toilet! I am amazed! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use . But not light in weight . Very small container . You have to fill it every 5 minutes . Very hot vapour
customer_reviews.author: Viviana

customer_reviews.title: Works great for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Makes cleaning/sanitizing an easy job. Easy to hold and carry, it is made for small cleaning jobs. I've noticed some complaints about the small tank size requiring constant refilling. This is like using a toothbrush to clean a bathroom. You use the appropriate equipment for the job. For larger cleaning jobs you can purchase a steam cleaner with a separate water tank, for small cleaning jobs, this works great!
customer_reviews.author: GMakTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Complicated watering can at best.
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews were correct. This doesn't really do anything as far as cleaning. Makes things wet if you need something to do that but I can think of better and cheaper ways.
customer_reviews.author: HouseCat

customer_reviews.title: A great little streamer for cleaning uses,  large and small.
customer_reviews.text: I've used steamers before, but nonever with the efficacy of this small appliance. I used it to clean a dirty stove top. The diet was ages old, but it worked like a dream! I'd recommend this product to anyone looking for a steamer. I'd like to know if the make larger streamers, like floor models.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Wilson-Sabin

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a hand-held steam cleaner for general household but specifically for bathroom cleaning. This isexactly what I wanted: lightweight (even when full) + puts out an amazing blast of steam + produces steam for a long time on just 1 cup of water + has several attachments + extra long cord!! I would recommend it to anyone who wants to really CLEAN!
customer_reviews.author: lad

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I have used a half dozen times, and really like this for the purpose I purchased for - cleaning toys. Easy to use and lots of steam
customer_reviews.author: Reader, Tx

customer_reviews.title: The product does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: The product works pretty good. I am pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn Payne

customer_reviews.title: Steamfast Everyday Handheld Steam Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: In short, I am really enjoying this product. I purchased the Steamfast Everyday Handheld Steam Cleaner just to mainly clean the hard surfaces in my home (counter-tops, fridge shelves, bathroom, etc) and it works great. Strong/steady steam flow, light-weight, only takes a few minutes to get hot/ready, and assembly/use is a breeze. This is my first steam cleaning device and I would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: eposner

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and perfect for a couch
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the compact size and the various attachments. It is easy to use and perfect for a couch, chair, or car cleaning. The downside is the limited water capacity. I have to refill it often for larger jobs, like when I used it to fight off bed bugs in a couple of used couches. For the money, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Garett P.

customer_reviews.title: It makes the cleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: We bought this steamer because the Shark floor steamer has made such a difference to our cleaning routine and we've long fantasized about taking it up the walls. This little steamer makes that possible. It's great for the weekly cleaning of the bathtub. It made short work of some smears of gunk left from the installation of the cupboards that couldn't be shifted with any cleaning products. Ditto the handles of the fridge. So far, it's actually fun to use. There's a real thrill with zapping smears and stains, giving a quick wipe and there's a visible difference. We're still learning and just getting started, but we're happy that this item popped up in a list of Amazon suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Paws

customer_reviews.title: Better as a sanitizer and not as a cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.text: This one was probably my expectations vs reality, but this steamer does not have a big "jet stream" kind of steam. I was expecting the steam to blast away grime and such, but it did not. It certainly loosens the muck, but you then have to wipe down all the surfaces, which is tricky for some of the places I wanted to use this for. It does heat up quick, and I did go about and sanitize all the knobs in my house. I was hoping this would be my go-to cleaner for everything, but I have a feeling this one will sit in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Staab

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, but I'm not certain as to the utility of this product. Water reservoir is too small which means you constantly have to stop and refill. Cleaning area is also too small, so it's not good for big projects. I bought it to clean my shower, but quickly abandoned that idea. The only thing I have found it useful for is cleaning small cracks and crevices around the stove in conjunction with a toothbrush. Other than these issues the quality seems good and as far as I can tell it probably works just as well as the one advertised on TV that sells for ten times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Retired World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Good head of steam
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with the power of this little unit. It has a pretty powerful blast of steam and I even put on a headphone set to protect my ears because it is very loud in a semi-enclosed space. It helps loosen up dirt and gunk so that it can be wiped away with a cloth or paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Anne in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The steamer produces steam but it didn't clean anything. I tried removing some grease from a stove top and it really didn't work. One thing it was good at was producing a lot of noise. Sounds like a steam train. If I hadn't thrown the packaging away I would be returning this, I guess I will try to use it as a clothes steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Works OK on small stuff. Not too good on tub, did not remove our soap/hard water stains. Is good for areas around the sinks, faucet toilets and cleaning mirrors or jewelry. I don't use it for everyday cleaning, only if I want to really do a thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: MRN66

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly  small
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how little water it holds it needs to be filled alot
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product two times it broken very easily I am not Purchasing this product any longer not good
customer_reviews.author: dawit abebe

customer_reviews.title: WHY didn't i buy this the first time!??!?
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other steamers, this one is far superior, and i'm so glad i didn't have to shell out a bunch of cash. still working wonderfully almost a year later (and counting)
customer_reviews.author: davopavo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best way to keep bathrooms germ free. Easy to use and eco-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my steamer. I don't even mind cleaning the bathroom with it. It make cleaning a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth A. Degregory

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 months and then it starts leaking. Not built to last
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hue Van

customer_reviews.title: No Return
customer_reviews.text: delivered with cut cord. I repaired cord. No steam wont release, bad purchase, dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Steamfast cleaner works well
customer_reviews.text: My wife used it once so far and was quite pleased wiyh it. Heats up quickly, gives good bursts of steam, isn't very messy to operate and seems as if it will be useful in the future. I am interested in what happens on the second use as many of the other comments centered about problems at that 2nd try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind on the market
customer_reviews.text: Own a cleaning company out of all the brands outthere this is my favorite . Is excellent for getting the nooks and crannies in fridges,window wells,sliding glass tracks,shower doors,and toilet seat hinges. My clients are also happy because it safe on the environment..... Oh yeah and makes sanitizing babies toys and areas a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well for small jobs. I had glue sprayed all over my laminate floor & didn't want to use a steam mop on a regular basis. This works.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: good product, but small tank capacity
customer_reviews.text: very good product, it serves and cleans very weel, the only thing that is not good is the tank capacity for water, it's very small and it's consumed really fast so you have to refill and wait again.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tool!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to flush the bedbugs out of my furniture! They dropped like flies - wow! Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: riguy63

customer_reviews.title: Nice quick steamer
customer_reviews.text: Really easy way to clean or disinfect things quickly. Easy to refill and use and works for a good 10 min I just use it for quick cleans
customer_reviews.author: JP Norritt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cleaning tool. Breaks free baked and caked crud, mildew and dust. Plenty of pressure and capacity. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: It did not clean my kitchen tile grout as advertised. Perhaps it works for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The water reservoir could be bigger but still like it!!! Wish I had purchased sooner..but did not know about them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ok for small cleaning jobs
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is ok for cleaning small spots. The water tank is too small. You need to make at least 5 water refills just to steam clean a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: NE-Fair

customer_reviews.title: Celans very well!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, easy to store, clear directions, adequate for household work. Very good job cleaning, no messes or residue after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Peters64

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fast setup
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out of the box and put it together. Super easy and fast setup. I was very impressed with this steamer! I was able to clean for 8-10 minutes before it was out of steam. I am surprised to read negative reviews on this product. Beware - It is really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Berry

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for cleaning silk flower arrangements
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for cleaning silk flower arrangements, fake ivy arrangements, fake trees, and indoor plants! Gets rid of the dust quickly with no residue. Love this little steamer! Everything looks brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Never works, hardly works, more cord than device, just a hassel, cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: It does the job quite well has all the extra tools you will need, and it is all included with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: steamer
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my my counter tops plus other things.
customer_reviews.author: Busterdog

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The only time this really cleaned anything well was when I used the wire brush that comes with it. That was probably more a function of the brush than the steam. I do think I disinfected a few things using the steamer, but overall, it was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Camise

customer_reviews.title: Its not good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning, it sucked! Sorry i could get more from my kids play set to clean my house then this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: The attachments do not work so great , but otherwise I get by for my light duty usage. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Harada

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my bathroom tiles and glass block!
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 3 minutes to warm up and 10 to cool. It cleans and sanitized my bathrooms from the shower tub sinks and toilets without using harsh chemical and I really was impressed with the shine left behind. The only problem is that it has to be held upright and if tilt it to the side even slightly the water in the reservoir spills out.
customer_reviews.author: jaslpmom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find it easier to use a disinfecting environmentally safe cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Marijean Williams

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: Portable, light weight, quick to heat - - - - absolutely love this little machine! Gets everything sanitary and clean - - - - especially carpet spots and grout. Highly recommend this steamer!
customer_reviews.author: W. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used, got burned the only time I tried.
customer_reviews.author: ESAW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice and made cleaning a lot simpler, just spray and wipe is all you need to do. I live in an apartment and the tub and shower insert is made of plastic and it always looked dirty even when I would scrub and soak with comet and it still didn't that clean. but the steam fast worked find. I have a few friends I will get them one.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Useful cleaning stored appliances and bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very useful in cleaning a new rental we moved into in November.
customer_reviews.author: C E Rich

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't steam clean anything. A waste of time and money. It last for 2 minutes then you have to refill the water. BUT you have to wait 5 minutes for it to cool down...making it the biggest hassle ever.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Roughley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought item would stronger, found it to be weak and does not do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ruppe

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Works good at a good price. It's a little bulky
customer_reviews.author: shecatpaws

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at how well it really works. I was a little apprehensive that it could really remove soap scum without cleaner, but it did an amazing on my shower door frame. Made the bathroom faucets look like new again. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. It meets my needs perfectly, and as I don't use it for big jobs, the amount of steam per fill is sufficient. The price was right, it is easy to use, the power cord is plenty long for what I do. A good buy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Freewheeling

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SMALL JOBS
customer_reviews.text: Great for small jobs. Only thing that could make this any better would be a larger water capacity. Used it to clean bird poop from a window screen, with great results!
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Tank is small like previous reviews, but works great for small jobs. It throws out some water with the steam. I wasn't expecting that. But I will use often.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift but my daughter loves it a d uses it all the time. She would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: stang 500

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I did not expect it to work this well. I use it every chance I get.
customer_reviews.author: Henno70

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't nearly powerful enough to do the job. Tried it on a wall and had to use too much 'elbow grease' so that it wore down the cheap brush attachment on the nozzle. A plain brush did much better. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Gene E. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: More otuward spray than actual steam to clean & sanitize
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited the day it came in the mail, but after using it the 1st, 2nd & 3rd (the LAST) time that same day, I realzied that it was not CLEANING anything. I was just getting everything WET :( I bought a steam cleaner off of Ebay YEARS ago & cannot remember the brand, but I hoped it would be good that that one was, but it was NOTHING close to even those Shark ones that don't work very good. Sorry, but it was a complete waste of time & money for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Greer House

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Small Steam Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Shark steam cleaner that quit working and was searching for a replacement. When I got this one, I discovered it was way more powerful than the Shark had been. It is easy to use and provides a lot of power for a small steamer. I am very happy with this purchase and the value of this steamer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: comes in very handy. recommend product. affordable and used for about 2 years and still going strong. A+ Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.text: .my bathroom and kitchen and drall surface all surface cleaner does the job gets it done sell more as long as you know how to operate it correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is REALLY loud. I haven't really owned another steamer, but it's too loud, it doesn't really take out really bad stains in the bathroom. I'm better off scrubbing and then steaming over it. DId I mention it's loud? It is loud!
customer_reviews.author: MAPN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Re-caning antique chair, made the job speedy, now it's finished, in record time
customer_reviews.author: C. N.

customer_reviews.title: What cleaning?
customer_reviews.text: The steam isn't powerful AT ALL. I ended up using a Magic Eraser and elbow grease. Maybe this is fine for a "cheap steamer" but it doesn't clean.
customer_reviews.author: SurferGirl

customer_reviews.title: Just what the person wanted
customer_reviews.text: Compared this to others and settled on this one. Its done the job well and it travels well so good for someone who travels back and forth regularly
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Herzegovitch

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cleans those hard to reach spots...just have to refill with water to quickly and wait for it to heat up again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Forget about it!
customer_reviews.text: Useless, can't do simple jobs in the write up. Save return postage and avoid. Too small a container and not enough heat
customer_reviews.author: rfb431

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Works great Saves on scrubbing and would recommend this product to anyone. Definitely worth the money and cuts cleaning time in half
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this merchandise, it time clean and get all the dirt out.Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leyba

customer_reviews.title: tank too small
customer_reviews.text: does a great job..my only complaint is that the tank is too small. You have to keep filling it, waiting for the water to heat....
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, got more than what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: not so effective.
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove grease the way I had hoped it would. I still need to use a cleaning product and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: I have used handheld steamers before and this is the worst one ever
customer_reviews.text: I have never wrote a review before now, but I felt I had to after receiving this product. The product had already been used when I received it and it had white gunk packed on the inside where the water is supposed to go. I tried to clean out the steamer and it still doesn't even work right. I have used handheld steamers before and this is the worst one ever! I will never trust this supplier again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned it! very noisy and gives you only 15-20 min of steam to work with
customer_reviews.author: Natural Girl

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the product.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't perform as I expected. I tried to use it on my stove top, and it did almost nothing. I tried using it on the glass part of my oven door, and it did nothing. Fortunately, I was able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire T. Polcari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Produced minimal effective steam and runs out of water supply very quickly. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: There was not enough power with the steamer. Did not work on bathtub or sink, more of a disinfectant if anything.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the handheld steamer
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the handheld steamer. I've tried it on several different things and it does nothing. Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Higley

customer_reviews.title: Weak product
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS JUNK, GOOD IDEA WEAK PRODUCT. THIS STEAMER DOES NOT WORK ON REAL LIFE GRIT AND GRIME. DISAPPOINTED !!!
customer_reviews.author: philip cabrera

customer_reviews.title: OK for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works OK, but it lacks pressure so you can get the really hard stains out. If you are just looking to do small jobs it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Rev1

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own one.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this was I borrowed one from my neighbor and couldn't stop using it. I'm a really clean person and while using this machine I was shocked how dirty my home really was. I quickly went on line and ordered my own. Not only is it easy to use it's really a lot of fun once you get going with it. It also does so much more you can steam clean your clothing as well. Don't wait order today! I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: AGREEN

customer_reviews.title: Wow, awesome steam equipment
customer_reviews.text: This equipment is good to remove animal waste on the carpet. I have 19 year old senior cat with Alzheimer, (my Vet said so) and having a tough time locating his kitty litter box inside the bathroom. Often on he will accidentally, "go to bathroom" anywhere inside the living room. This equipment comes in handy when I need to clean his mess. All I do is use this equipment with small cloth towel to remove the liquid coming out of the carpet from steam pressure. After few hours, I can see that my cat's stain is removed and it almost looks like a new carpet. Overall I am glad that i bought this Steamfast SF-210 from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well...for 5 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews, and the consensus seemed to be that this was a good product but the downside was the fact that the reservoir only held enough water to last five minutes. I will say that this product works very well; it is effective and lightweight. However it's only useful for smaller household chores, i.e. cleaning/disinfecting sinks, toys, midsized appliances, inside refrigerators, etc. I would not recommend this steamer for large jobs, like cleaning showers/bathtubs. All in all, I think anyone who has small children would enjoy the peace of mind of knowing their children's toys, etc. can easily be made germ free.
customer_reviews.author: DMc

customer_reviews.title: The Steam is very weak
customer_reviews.text: The Steam is weak it okay but not that good does nothing for the bathroom and the kitchen soap and water did a better job then this so dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: conan white

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: This is a open message to all my neat freak friends and more importantly my not so neat friends. Buy this machine! It is easy to use, and it cleans everything. I used it on a spot on my carpet that I was told by the cleaners would not come out and guess what? It came out. Once I started playing with this I could not put it down. I went from room to room cleaning tiles, sliding door jams, and even the darkened grout in my kitchen (good luck Tile cleaners next week if your job doesn't look as good as what I did today). Well worth the price which is not even that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: This little steamer dies the truck on steaming things I use it in my house on curtains countertops it works and was well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Handheld Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of steam mops and a large steam cleaner. I love the fact that you don't have to use chemicals to get your house clean. I don't like my large steam cleaner as it is awkward to use. I have tried to buy handheld steamers in the past, but had to return because it/they didn't work. This cleaner holds enough water to get thejob done, but not so large to be bulky. I have cleaned my stove top, oven, shower, and the grout in my entryway. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: cathy from coralville

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and useful steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A really nice product. We saw the refrigerator repair man use this portable product to help defrost the fridge tray. As expected, with a scrub pad, it was quite useful for spot steam cleaning the shower tile. I recommend a slightly larger (water reservoir) unit for home, I bet I could use it to de-wrinkle my dress shirts.👔💸🍔🍔
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: works.
customer_reviews.text: I have used steam cleaners before, for my floors. I am not thrilled with this one. I heard about it at coffee klatch, so decided to join the team...It works all right; I use it for the shower, so even though I may not be able to "see" any difference, I feel better that the steam is cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning TINY areas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer thinking that it would be great for cleaning soap scum in the bathtub. I found this steamer produces such a tiny stream of steam that it would take many hours to steam clean a bathtub. Using any of the tools included reduced the temperature and diffused the tiny stream so that it was ineffective. I used it once, for about ten minutes, then gave up on it. Now it takes up space in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Melsie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy &  waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: Just starting using it..First time it did good. Next time a week later, would not hold steam pressure. totally unusable for it's purpose. Way past time to return. Not happy at all. Tried it again yesterday. Followed the directions just like the first two times. It also would not hold steam pressure. it will go into the garbage and I am out 70.00. :(
customer_reviews.author: Eb

product_meta.title: Steamfast SF-210 Steam Cleaner with 6 Accessories, Handheld, White
product_meta.description:
The Steamfast SF-210 Everyday Steam Cleaner places the power and convenience of steam cleaning in your hand. Lightweight and portable, the Everyday Steam Cleaner fits all of the benefits of steam cleaning into a form factor that is easy to use and store. The Everyday Steam Cleaner is ready in 3 minutes or less harnessing the natural effective power of steam to clean and sanitize a wide variety of surfaces. Steam kills 99. 9% of germs and bacteria. The SF-210 comes with multiple accessories to make common cleaning tasks simple. From kitchen counters to bathroom tiles, blast away dirt and grime throughout your home with the Everyday Steam Cleaner.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM PORTABILITY — Designed for ease of use with a 12-foot power cord and a 28-inch attachable extension hose that provides added reach for those hard to get to places
6 VERSATILE ACCESSORIES — Equipped for steam cleaning jobs in and around your home including a brass brush jet nozzle extension hose measuring cup nylon brushes and more
QUICK HEAT UP TIME — The 6-ounce water tank heats up in 3 minutes and provides up to 8 minutes of steam

CHEMICAL-FREE CLEANING — Naturally deep clean without the use of harsh chemicals using hot pressured steam to eliminate grease grime stains and mold from a wide range of surfaces including ceramic tile grout granite appliances grills autos and more
SANITIZE SURFACES — Steam kills 99. 9% of germs and bacteria.

SUPERIOR SATISFACTION — When you choose a Steamfast product you’re investing in superior performance and design that will deliver total satisfaction If not we’ll replace it for 2 years Supported by a customer service team based in Andover KS
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements Certified safety-tested and warrantied for use only in the U. S.
